segments.text: The sink is overflowing, water everywhereâ€”it's disgusting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet just keeps running without stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman is clueless, focused only on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's widening right under her, she could slip badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool the boy's on is tilting back precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar, smiling I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting patiently with her arm stretched out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking the rules, sneaking those treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window overlooks a tidy yard, so serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the mess is going to cause real trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter might topple too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the cabinets taking all that water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR
